name: Echizen-gani
description:
Travel back in time to what I think the Edo period looked like to find the crab known around the world as "really delicious."

Made for the 2021 /RPGM/ Winter Jam

*this game uses audio that I obviously didn't make myself. Check the readme for the tracklist and plugins

CHANGELOG

12/23/2021:

+Tiger break now targets all enemies.

+Added dodge skill to Tora Style

+Sidestep and dodge now resist negative physical states

+Historical correction on map003

+Minor (actually major) fixes

+Updated localization files

12/22/2021 :

Released for beta testing
